posttype_web.post_content: Flyer communication offers consulting, development, support and management of the online, mobile and social networks presence of organizations and companies: from concept and project, to design, to software development as to the creation and management of textual, photographic, video and interactive contents.

content.rendered:
New website and related app for viewing the first and only TV dedicated to Audio Visuals Performing Arts.

The TV schedule is created entirely with content from the largest community in the sector: AVnode.net

The daily programming is:

06:00 – 12:00 Documentary
Here is a collection of workshops, interview and report live video related.

12:00 – 18:00 Video
All those videos are made from vjs and audio visual artists so you could find a lots of differences in technical and style.

18:00 – 00:00 Performances
This is the time of the audio visual performances, live cinema, mapping, generative and many other styles of live performances.

00:00 – 06:00 VJ-DJ Sets
Let’s get party with the best VJ from all over the world.

Site made entirely in NodeJS and the WordPress and AVnode APIs.

excerpt.rendered: New website and related app for viewing the first and only TV dedicated to Audio Visuals Performing Arts. The TV…

content.rendered:
New step forward for the community and database AVnode.net build from Flyer, a project of the Dutch AVnode Foundation which inherits the data of the historic FLxER.net community, becoming the most important reference point for Audio Visuals Arts.

This third phase, after importing all the FLxER data into the first one and the activation of the “call for proposals” engine, now is allowed to manage the partners and many other tools are now available to the many members organizations.

The new platform is entirely built in NodeJS and MongoDB.

excerpt.rendered: New step forward for the community and database AVnode.net build from Flyer, a project of the Dutch AVnode Foundation which…

content.rendered:
New website for the project!

The contents of the site are also available for smartphones.

On the site you can find information about the program and the locations, the artists and the installations and performances, as well as the many social activities of the project.

Born from the collaboration between Fusolab, Flyer and Liceo Scientifico Statale Francesco D’Assisi, the project – winner of the “Scuola attiva la cultura” call launched by MIBACT within the Cultura Futuro Urbano plan – aims to enhance the cultural paths already present in the area with the ambition to create new ones.

Site created entirely in WordPress and the Firebase and MapBox APIs.

excerpt.rendered: New website for the project! The contents of the site are also available for smartphones. On the site you can…

content.rendered:
New web site for the new edition of Live Performers Meeting, LPM 2020 Rome!

The contents of the site are also available via smartphone.

On the site you can find information about the program and the locations, artists and performances, and view materials and content of previous editions.

Web site fully done in NodeJS and the API of WordPress and AVnode.

excerpt.rendered: New web site for the new edition of Live Performers Meeting, LPM 2020 Rome! The contents of the site are…

results.news:
We have created an “EXTRA” webpage to keep you up to date with the activities of Flyer throughout the year: events in collaboration with our partners, workshops and performances presented by Flyer at international festivals, and news about the latest trends in the field of Audio Visuals Performing Arts an communication. Join us, and follow the community!!!

avnode.about:
Flyer new media è una all media agency dinamica e giovane che sviluppa servizi incentrati sulla comunicazione.

La competenza acquisita nel settore ci permette di fornire ai nostri clienti soluzioni che spaziano dalla progettazione e realizzazione di siti internet allo sviluppo di applicativi e gestionali web based.

Siamo il partner ideale per tutte quelle aziende che desiderano incrementare il proprio business investendo sulle nuove tecnologie dell'informazione con un prodotto originale, creativo e all'avanguardia.

Per garantire soluzioni ad...
avnode.aboutFull:
Flyer new media è una all media agency dinamica e giovane che sviluppa servizi incentrati sulla comunicazione.

La competenza acquisita nel settore ci permette di fornire ai nostri clienti soluzioni che spaziano dalla progettazione e realizzazione di siti internet allo sviluppo di applicativi e gestionali web based.

Siamo il partner ideale per tutte quelle aziende che desiderano incrementare il proprio business investendo sulle nuove tecnologie dell'informazione con un prodotto originale, creativo e all'avanguardia.

Per garantire soluzioni ad alto valore aggiunto, Flyer Communication ha maturato nel tempo una sintesi tra competenze, professionalità e creatività. Il nostro è un team di creativi, esperti di nuove tecnologie e consulenti della comunicazione, in grado di interpretare le esigenze e i cambiamenti in atto nel marketing contemporaneo e proporre soluzioni innovative con elevati livelli di personalizzazione.

Offriamo idee nuove ed evolute per un uso libero e innovativo degli strumenti di comunicazione disponibili. Uniamo strategia e creatività per definire e migliorare continuamente l'immagine e il rapporto con l'ambiente in cui operiamo.

COMUNICAZIONE E MARKETING

Strategie di presenza in rete

Strategie di Direct Marketing

Progettazione di soluzioni gestionali web based

Servizi di Content Management

INTERNET & NEW MEDIA

Web DesignMotion

GraphicAdvergames e Infotainment

Post-produzione audio/video

WEB BASED SOFTWARE

Sistemi gestionali

Desktop Publishing

Intranet ed Extranet

Streaming audio/video
